name: Hexa Runner
description:
The game developer is my friend:  Hexa(Pb9x)

~ Version: Alpha-0.5 

~ Release Date: 6/23/22 

~ Please note that: 

- When running the .exe file (Installer), windows will try and warn you but I can assure you it's totally safe and it's developed by GDevelop 5 Game Engine so click "Run Anyway"

- This is an alpha version (Preview). The game is still in its alpha phase, so bugs and features are still under development and will be fixed/added really soon!
